players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Be careful, the mafioso is among us and has already made their move. I suggest we question Alice's alibi and look into Bob and Charlie as well. Remember, the detective will be investigating tonight."
Charlie: "I will investigate Bob and Charlie tonight. Let's see if either of them has any suspicious activities or alibis that don't add up."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
